text: Approval to add an alternate trade name for the libert monorail and over-the-wire coronary stent systems.  The device will be marketed under the trade name veriflex bare metal coronary stent and is indicated for improving coronary luminal diameter in patients with symptomatic ischemic disease with stenotic lesions in native coronary arteries (length <28 mm) with a reference vessel diameter of 2.75 to 5.00 mm.
